mapper.select: SELECT f.id,u.phone toAddUsername,m.uid,m.nickname,m.avatar,f.processingTime,f.withTime,f.state FROM t_friends f LEFT JOIN ims_ewei_shop_member m ON f.uid=m.uid LEFT JOIN ims_users u on f.uid=u.uid WHERE toAddUsername =#{phone} AND state = 2 limit #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from t_friends where toAddUsername = #{phone} and state = 2
select * from t_friends where uid = #{loginUid} and toAddUsername = #{phone} AND state = 1
SELECT * FROM t_friends WHERE uid = #{uid} and toAddUsername = #{phone};
